definition: body odor/bromhidrosis/armpit odor/underarm stink/also called 狐臭[hu2 chou4]
many hairs make a fur coat (idiom); many small contributions add up to sth big/many a mickle makes a muckle
lit. armpit/elbow and armpit/fig. right up close (to a disaster)/in one's backyard/on one's doorstep
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
lit. calamity in one's armpit (idiom); a major coup happening on one's doorstep/trouble or danger in one's own backyard
axillary (botany)/budding in the angle between branch and stem

sentences.english: Could you change my seat please?
sentences.chinese: 牐犑欠窨商嫖腋换座位？

sentences.english: It is necessary and viable to preserve ICBN during axillary node clearance for carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 乳癌腋清扫术中保留ICBN是必要和可行的。

sentences.english: To sum up the nursing experience of intubation by anterior thoracic wall axillary vein puncture(IATAV).
sentences.chinese: 总结经胸前区腋静脉穿刺行中心静脉置管的护理经验。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the axillary vein is the continuation of the basilic vein.
sentences.chinese: 提出腋静脉是由贵要静脉延续而成。

sentences.english: The entering sites of axillaris nerve are all above the distal rim of the larger round muscle.
sentences.chinese: 腋神经入肌部位在大圆肌下缘以上发出。

sentences.english: The boy stood at his left side, taking the man's weight on his right shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子走将过去，将右肩承在他左腋之下。

sentences.english: Anterior and posterior branches are the main branches of the axillary nerve.
sentences.chinese: 腋神经主要分支有前支和后支。

sentences.english: Today, I was shaving my left armpit when I cut myself badly.
sentences.chinese: 今天，给我的左腋剃毛时将自己割伤了。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
creases/folds or pleats in a garment
sides of the lower part of the leg
